name: Melody Quest
description:
MELODY QUEST Do you have what it takes to restore music to the world?

Melody Quest is a music education/arcade action game with an 8-bit retro style, offering a fun and engaging approach to help students with memorization of musical note placement on the staff and basic musical theory concepts.  Players will explore the depths of a mysterious dungeon, navigating maze-like levels, dodging enemies, and facing-off against a variety of bosses while collecting notes on a quest to recover the "Pentatonic," a magical relic that provides the source of all music in the world. 

Melody Quest features original pixel art and an original 8-bit-inspired soundtrack of 12+ tracks. The game also features a scoring system that rewards flawless playing with score multiplier bonuses, encouraging replay for high score attempts.

NOTE: This is an early build of the game with a limited number of levels. If the viewing window is too small, try adjusting with your browser zoom setting until the game content fits your screen. (i.e. ctrl + scroll wheel in most browsers).  Please leave any feedback you might have in the comments below!

Listen to the soundtrack here:  https://soundcloud.com/dinitrogen-games
